entry.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Inheritance Schemes
entry.summary: Jeremy Rubin, in his latest post, delves into the topic of giving away bitcoin after death. He offers interesting primitives that can initiate a discussion on various inheritance schemes that could be useful. One point he highlights is how the UTXO model poses challenges in creating inheritance backups compared to a monolithic account model. To learn more about this topic, readers can visit his blog through the link provided in the post.
